ud7.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud7.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma annasikondanno bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya tanhasankhayavimuttim paccavekkhamano.
ud7.6:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam annasikondannam avidure nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya tanhasankhayavimuttim paccavekkhamanam.
